id.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

statistics.description: Include project statistics. Available only to users with at least the Reporter role.

with_custom_attributes.description: Include custom attributes in response (administrators only).

notes: Response includes project details such as description, visibility, URLs, namespace, permissions, and configuration settings.
If the project is a fork, response contains `forked_from_project` object.

id_after.description: Limit results to projects with IDs greater than the specified ID.

id_before.description: Limit results to projects with IDs less than the specified ID.

imported.description: Limit results to projects imported from external systems by the current user.

include_hidden.description: Include hidden projects (administrators only). Premium and Ultimate only.

last_activity_after.description: Limit results to projects with last activity after the specified time (ISO 8601).

last_activity_before.description: Limit results to projects with last activity before the specified time (ISO 8601).

membership.description: Limit to projects that the current user is a member of.

min_access_level.description: Limit to projects where the current user has at least this role (access_level).

order_by.description: Order projects by id, name, path, created_at, updated_at, star_count, last_activity_at, or similarity. Some fields restricted to administrators.

owned.description: Limit to projects explicitly owned by the current user.

repository_checksum_failed.description: Limit projects where the repository checksum calculation has failed. Premium and Ultimate only.

repository_storage.description: Limit to projects stored on a specific repository_storage (administrators only).

search_namespaces.description: Include ancestor namespaces when matching search criteria. Default: false.

search.description: Search projects by path, name, or description (case-insensitive, substring match). Multiple terms separated by + or %20.

simple.description: Return limited fields for each project. Default behavior for unauthenticated requests.

sort.description: Sort results in asc or desc order. Default: desc.

starred.description: Limit to projects starred by the current user.

statistics.description: Include project statistics (requires Reporter or higher).

topic_id.description: Limit to projects assigned a specific topic ID.

topic.description: Comma-separated list of topics. Returns projects that match all given topics.

updated_after.description: Limit to projects updated after this time (ISO 8601). Requires order_by=updated_at. Introduced in GitLab 15.10.

updated_before.description: Limit to projects updated before this time (ISO 8601). Requires order_by=updated_at. Introduced in GitLab 15.10.

visibility.description: Limit by visibility: public, internal, or private.

wiki_checksum_failed.description: Limit projects where the wiki checksum calculation has failed. Premium and Ultimate only.

with_custom_attributes.description: Include custom attributes in the response (administrators only).

with_issues_enabled.description: Limit to projects with issues enabled.

with_merge_requests_enabled.description: Limit to projects with merge requests enabled.

with_programming_language.description: Limit to projects that use the specified programming language.

marked_for_deletion_on.description: Filter by date when project was marked for deletion. Introduced in GitLab 17.1. Premium and Ultimate only.

active.description: Limit to active projects (not archived and not marked for deletion).

user_id.description: The ID or username of the user.

id_after.description: Limit results to projects with IDs greater than the specified ID.

id_before.description: Limit results to projects with IDs less than the specified ID.

membership.description: Limit to projects that the current user is a member of.

min_access_level.description: Limit to projects where the current user has at least this role (access_level).

order_by.description: Order projects by id, name, path, created_at, updated_at, star_count, or last_activity_at. Default: created_at.

owned.description: Limit to projects explicitly owned by the current user.

search.description: Search projects by name, path, or description.

simple.description: Return limited fields for each project. Without authentication this is the default.

sort.description: Sort results in asc or desc order. Default: desc.

starred.description: Limit to projects starred by the current user.

statistics.description: Include project statistics (requires Reporter or higher).

updated_after.description: Limit to projects updated after this time (ISO 8601). Introduced in GitLab 15.10.

updated_before.description: Limit to projects updated before this time (ISO 8601). Introduced in GitLab 15.10.

visibility.description: Limit by visibility: public, internal, or private.

with_custom_attributes.description: Include custom attributes in the response (administrators only).

with_issues_enabled.description: Limit to projects with issues enabled.

with_merge_requests_enabled.description: Limit to projects with merge requests enabled.

with_programming_language.description: Limit to projects that use the specified programming language.

name.description: Project name. Required if path is not provided; defaults to path if omitted.

path.description: Repository path (derived from name if omitted). Must not start/end with a special character or contain consecutive special characters.

allow_merge_on_skipped_pipeline.description: Allow merging when jobs are skipped.

approvals_before_merge.description: Number of required approvals by default. Deprecated; use merge request approvals API.

auto_cancel_pending_pipelines.description: Auto-cancel pending pipelines (toggle string; not a boolean).

auto_devops_deploy_strategy.description: Auto Deploy strategy: continuous, manual, or timed_incremental.

autoclose_referenced_issues.description: Auto-close issues referenced on the default branch.

avatar.description: Image file for the project avatar.

build_timeout.description: Max job run time, in seconds.

container_expiration_policy_attributes.description: Container registry cleanup policy settings (cadence, keep_n, older_than, name_regex, name_regex_delete, name_regex_keep, enabled).

default_branch.description: Default branch name. Requires initialize_with_readme to be true.

group_runners_enabled.description: Enable group runners for this project.

group_with_project_templates_id.description: Group ID for custom project templates (when use_custom_template is true).

import_url.description: Import repository URL. Must not be set with initialize_with_readme.

initialize_with_readme.description: Create repository with an initial README.md (default false). Incompatible with import_url and other content attributes.

merge_method.description: Merge method: merge, rebase_merge, or ff.

merge_trains_skip_train_allowed.description: Allow skipping the train to merge without waiting for pipelines.

namespace_id.description: Target namespace (group/subgroup) ID. Defaults to current userâ€™s namespace if omitted.

only_allow_merge_if_all_discussions_are_.description: Require all discussions to be resolved before merging.

only_allow_merge_if_all_status_checks_pa.description: Block merges unless all status checks pass.

printing_merge_request_link_enabled.description: Show link to create/view merge requests on push.

remove_source_branch_after_merge.description: Enable Delete source branch by default.

repository_storage.description: Storage shard for the repository (admin only).

shared_runners_enabled.description: Enable instance runners for this project.

squash_option.description: Squash options: never, always, default_on, or default_off.

template_name.description: Built-in or custom template name (when using templates).

template_project_id.description: Project ID of a custom project template.

topics.description: List of topics for the project.

use_custom_template.description: Use instance or group custom project template.

visibility.description: Project visibility: private, internal, or public.

id.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

allow_merge_on_skipped_pipeline.description: Allow merging when jobs are skipped.

allow_pipeline_trigger_approve_deploymen.description: Allow a pipeline triggerer to approve deployments.

only_allow_merge_if_all_status_checks_pa.description: Block merges unless all status checks pass.

approvals_before_merge.description: Default approvals required. Deprecated; use merge request approvals API.

auto_duo_code_review_enabled.description: Enable automatic reviews by GitLab Duo on merge requests.

autoclose_referenced_issues.description: Auto-close referenced issues on default branch.

build_timeout.description: Max job run time in seconds.

ci_default_git_depth.description: Default number of revisions for shallow cloning.

ci_delete_pipelines_in_seconds.description: Delete pipelines older than the configured time (seconds).

ci_allow_fork_pipelines_to_run_in_parent.description: Allow running pipelines in the parent project for MR from forks.

ci_id_token_sub_claim_components.description: Fields in the sub claim of the ID Token (e.g., ["project_path","ref_type","ref"]).

ci_separated_caches.description: Separate caches by branch protection status.

ci_restrict_pipeline_cancellation_role.description: Role required to cancel a pipeline or job: developer, maintainer, or no_one.

ci_pipeline_variables_minimum_override_r.description: Role allowed to override pipeline variables: owner, maintainer, developer, or no_one_allowed.

ci_push_repository_for_job_token_allowed.description: Allow pushing to repository using job token.

max_artifacts_size.description: Max file size (MB) for individual job artifacts.

merge_method.description: Merge method: merge, rebase_merge, or ff.

merge_trains_skip_train_allowed.description: Allow skipping train to merge without waiting for pipelines.

mirror_user_id.description: User responsible for pull mirror actions (admin only).

mr_default_target_self.description: For forks, target merge requests to this project; false targets upstream.

only_allow_merge_if_all_discussions_are_.description: Require all discussions to be resolved before merging.

prevent_merge_without_jira_issue.description: Require associated Jira issue for merge requests.

printing_merge_request_link_enabled.description: Show link to create/view merge requests on push.

remove_source_branch_after_merge.description: Enable Delete source branch by default.

issue_branch_template.description: Template for branches created from issues.

spp_repository_pipeline_access.description: Allow read-only access to fetch security policy configs from this project.

squash_option.description: Squash options: never, always, default_on, or default_off.

suggestion_commit_message.description: Commit message used to apply merge request suggestions.

web_based_commit_signing_enabled.description: Enable web-based commit signing for commits made in the UI (SaaS only).

id.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project to archive.
ID or URL-encoded path of the project to unarchive.
ID or URL-encoded path of the project to delete.

permanently_remove.description: Immediately delete if the project is already marked for deletion.

action: Restore a project marked for deletion

id.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

action: Transfer a project to a new namespace

id.description: ID or URL-encoded path of the project.

namespace.description: ID or path of the destination namespace.
